Typedef Documentation

typedef void(^ OOContentTreeCallback)(OOContentItem *contentItem, OOOoyalaError *error)

The callback used for contentTree:callback: (OOOoyalaAPIClient) calls

Parameters
[in]contentItemthe root content item fetched in the contentTree call
[in]errorthe OOOoyalaError if one occurreds
typedef void(^ OOContentTreeNextCallback)(NSRange range, OOOoyalaError *error)

The callback used for contentTreeNext:callback: (OOOoyalaAPIClient) calls

Parameters
[in]rangethe NSRange denoting the new children added
[in]errorthe OOOoyalaError if one occurred
typedef void(^ OOCurrentItemChangedCallback)(OOVideo *currentItem)

The callback called when the current item is changed in an OOOoyalaPlayer

Parameters
[in]currentItemthe new current item
typedef void(^ OOFetchMoreChildrenCallback)(NSRange range, OOOoyalaError *error)

The callback used for fetchMoreChildren: (OOPaginatedParentItem-p) calls.

Parameters
[in]rangethe NSRange denoting the start index of the new children and the number of new children fetched
[in]erroran OOOoyalaError denoting what error occurred (nil if no error)
typedef void(^ OOMetadataDictionaryFromAPICallback)(OOOoyalaError *error)

The callback used for OOOoyalaAPIClient.metadata:params:callback: calls

Parameters
[in]errorthe OOOoyalaError if one occurred
typedef void(^ OOObjectFromBacklotAPICallback)(NSObject *object)

The callback used for objectFromBacklotAPI:params:callback: (OOOoyalaAPIClient) calls

Parameters
[in]objectthe NSArray or NSDictionary returned from the backlot API
